name: VR SHOOTER
description:
This is a 3D shooter for google cardboard on android.

Your goal is simply to kill zombies with machine guns or grenades.
You can turn this location into a branch of hell and shower everything with grenades (yes, grenades have no stun)
Nothing else will be here, you cannot even die. Maybe someday I will fix the flight of zombie corpses after death.

To play, you will also need a wireless mouse with the ability to connect to the phone (see example in the screenshot)

There are 2 ready-made assets used here:
1) Asset with zombies, I don't know who its real creator is, so if you know, let me know.
2) Asset with weapons, it is really very high quality (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/weapons/low-poly-fps-pack-free-sample-144839)

Here you can see an example of gameplay without installing the game.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1T5lCmCiTq2JbPb9KlwuBwJcQMsM9F4gL/view?usp=shari...
